string.text: The radius of the surface around the player, which should be more or less flat so that it is possible to set a campfire. \n \n Default: 3.0
Difference limit in distance between rays casted to surface, used to figure if surface is flat. Increase slider if you want to be able to place campfires on more uneven surfaces. \n \n Default: 0.4
Delete placed campfires on level change
Removes placed campfires on every level transition. \n \n Default: On
